mapper.select: SELECT B.EMPLOYEE_ID, B.FIRST_NAME, B.LAST_NAME, B.EMAIL, B.PHONE_NUMBER, B.HIRE_DATE, B.JOB_ID, B.SALARY, B.COMMISSION_PCT, B.MANAGER_ID, B.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.EMPLOYEE_ID, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE_NUMBER, A.HIRE_DATE, A.JOB_ID, A.SALARY, A.COMMISSION_PCT, A.MANAGER_ID, A.DEPARTMENT_ID FROM (SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, HIRE_DATE, JOB_ID, SALARY, COMMISSION_PCT, MANAGER_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID FROM EMPLOYEES ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
